name: A Trap Game
storyline: The Little Foxie embarks on an adventure full of dangers. He enters a dungeon full of traps he must avoid in order to survive and rescue his best friend Valeria, who is held hostage by Eagleor. Will you be able to survive the dungeon to save Valeria?
summary: This game is about a fox who has to avoid traps in a dungeon. is a platform game similar to Trap Adventure 2.
